# translate

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of translate is to allow users to switch easily between translation APIs and packages.

## Installation

You can install the released version of translate from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("translate")
```

## Loading the Package

```{r example}
library(translate)
```
